posts.title: Markdown Feature Showcase
posts.excerpt:
# Markdown Feature Showcase
A quick test post to exercise common Markdown features rendered by markdown-it.
## Text emphasis
*Italic* _Italic_ **Bold** __Bold__ **_Bold Italic_** ~~Strikethrough~~ and `inline code`.
## Blockquote
> A short quote with **bold** and `inline code`.
## Lists
- Bullet one
- Bullet two
  - Nested bullet
